about_the_game:
BEAST BRAWL is a strategic roguelike auto-battler which pits teams of primal beasts against one another in a battle for survival.



Thousands of Combos – Choose from over 30 unique beasts to form your champion team. Mix and match from 15 traits and over 15 upgrades to empower your team with new abilities. Discover overpowered combos and more!



Survival of the Fittest – New beasts enter the fray every round, you must upgrade and be on your toes or be left behind!



Chill or Tryhard – Wanna just chill? There’s a chill mode for you! Want to really test your skills? There’s a tryhard mode with advanced difficulty for you too!

SELLING POINTS FOR NERDS

Like to geek out about game systems and math out the optimal strats? Then this section is for you!

Deterministic Battles – Zero randomness in the battle system, every battle and its results can be recreated with the exact same inputs and outputs. See someone else’s team that looks strong? Replicate it with the exact same results!

Superposition Turn-Based System – Despite the visuals, beasts do not take “turns” acting in battle. Everyone acts at the same time during a turn and every action is resolved simultaneously in our unique superposition battle system.

Emergent Systems – Beast Brawl is designed around letting players discover new and broken combos, evolving their teams into the ultimate apex beasts.

JOIN OUR COMMUNITY DISCORD

Discuss strategies and share your victories, join with the link in the sidebar on the right!
🢂🢂🢂🢂
